data.text: @ThaDordy @Zigmanfreud There is reportage that the Korean authorities, having identified that Omicron only engages with upper respiratory tract (sniffles) plus the fact the majority of their population is vaccinated, are explicitly content for it to spread now, adding the benefits of natural immunity.

@Zigmanfreud There are like 10 of us who have started using zinc ionophore, everybody around us is getting ill, I wonder if the people will ever realize what is being done to them. https://t.co/CZjYZaWT3N

@ThaDordy @Zigmanfreud Ahahaha. Scientists create a "theoretical model". Hey dumbass do you even know an RCT study is? Do you understand the the difference in rigor between that and basing results on a theoretical model? They count on midwits like you to not be smart enough to know the difference.

@ThaDordy @Zigmanfreud For decades it was understood masks didn't protect against respiratory viruses. The packaging even warned so. Here's ten randomized double blind studies showing masks are ineffective in reducing the spread of respiratory viruses.
https://t.co/m76qftmk7B
@ThaDordy @Zigmanfreud Yes you are a shining example.

@ThaDordy @Zigmanfreud No. Masks do not reduce spread. One of the most successful pieces of mass hypnosis in history. Every purported study showing that they do work was flawed. None were truly RCT. Dozens and dozens of RCT trials have shown masks are ineffective in stopping the spread of viruses.
